title: Lily UPC
content:
Hi!

I want to ask some help. I made a logo design last week with AI CS3. I saved it  
only in an "ai" file. Last night, my complete system crashed and I had to reinstall  
everything. Now I tried to open my work and it sad, that Lily UPC font is missing, and  
it opens the file, but the text is full of with missing character boxes.  
Can anyone tell me, where can I download Lily UPC (or just simpy email me the upcll.ttf if you have got it), or with whitch program comes it together? (On my previous system there was a lot of demos installed, with Windows Vista Ult. Now i installed WinXP. Prof.)

It's very important for me, becouse the customer has already accepted the plans and waiting for the finished work...

Thanks and sorry about my poor English.

Mate
author: koch.mate

comments.content: According to [this Microsoft page](http://web.archive.org/web/20120416000849/http:/www.microsoft.com/typography/fonts/font.aspx?FID=272&FNAME=LilyUPC&FVER=2.20) Lily UPC should come installed with Windows XP (and XP SP2)

Lily UPC is a Thai font so won't be installed by default on XP - install additional fonts via the language and regional options control panel - should be two options one for complex scripts and one for East Asian fonts - select both.

Cheers, Si

It works now, thank you very much!

Mate
